characters.description: The narrator of the story, Nick is a young man from the Midwest who moves to West Egg to learn the bond business. He is tolerant and non-judgmental, which makes him a confidant to many, but he also feels disillusioned by the superficiality and moral decay of the wealthy East Coast society.
characters.description_ko: 이야기의 화자인 닉은 채권 사업을 배우기 위해 중서부에서 웨스트에그로 이사 온 젊은이이다. 그는 관용적이고 비판적이지 않아서 많은 사람들의 신뢰를 얻지만, 동시에 부유한 동부 해안 사회의 피상성과 도덕적 타락에 환멸을 느낀다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Gatsby in his mid-thirties, standing on his mansion's lawn at night, gazing wistfully towards a distant green light. He wears a cream-colored suit, a pink shirt, and a gold tie, reflecting his nouveau riche status. His expression is a mix of hope and longing, with a hint of sadness in his eyes. The background features his opulent mansion, softly lit, with a sense of mystery and grandeur. Style: Painterly, with rich colors and dramatic lighting.
characters.description: Gatsby is a mysterious and wealthy man who lives in a lavish mansion in West Egg. He is known for throwing extravagant parties, but his true desire is to recapture a lost love from his past.
characters.description_ko: 개츠비는 웨스트 에그의 호화로운 저택에 사는 신비롭고 부유한 남자이다. 그는 사치스러운 파티를 여는 것으로 유명하지만, 그의 진정한 욕망은 과거의 잃어버린 사랑을 되찾는 것이다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Tom Buchanan, a sturdy, straw-haired man in his early thirties, with a hard mouth and arrogant eyes. He is dressed in riding clothes, emphasizing his wealth and privileged background. His posture is aggressive, leaning forward, suggesting his domineering personality. The background features a lavish Georgian Colonial mansion, symbolizing his established wealth and status. Style: Realistic, with sharp lines and a focus on physical details.
characters.description: Tom is a wealthy and arrogant man, married to Daisy Buchanan. He is physically imposing and openly displays his dominance, embodying the careless and destructive nature of the established elite.
characters.description_ko: 톰은 부유하고 오만한 남자이며, 데이지 뷰캐넌과 결혼했다. 그는 육체적으로 건장하며 자신의 지배력을 공공연히 드러내고, 기득권층의 부주의하고 파괴적인 본성을 구현한다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Daisy Buchanan, a beautiful woman with a sad and lovely face, framed by bright eyes and a passionate mouth. She wears a white dress, symbolizing her fragile innocence, and is adorned with pearls. Her expression is a mixture of longing and despair, reflecting her inner turmoil. The background features a lavish interior with French windows, suggesting her confinement within her opulent lifestyle. Style: Impressionistic, with soft, dreamy colors and a focus on emotional expression.
characters.description: Daisy is Nick's cousin and Tom's wife, known for her enchanting voice and captivating charm. She is torn between her love for Gatsby and her loyalty to her husband, representing the allure and disillusionment of wealth and social status.
characters.description_ko: 데이지는 닉의 사촌이자 톰의 아내로, 매혹적인 목소리와 매력적인 자태로 유명하다. 그녀는 개츠비에 대한 사랑과 남편에 대한 충성심 사이에서 갈등하며, 부와 사회적 지위의 매력과 환멸을 대변한다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Jordan Baker, a slender, small-breasted girl with an erect carriage, dressed in sporty attire, reflecting her profession as a golfer. Her grey sun-strained eyes look back with polite reciprocal curiosity out of a wan, charming, discontented face. The background features a golf course or a luxurious country club, suggesting her active and privileged lifestyle. Style: Art Deco, with clean lines, geometric shapes, and a focus on sophistication and modernity.
characters.description: Jordan is a professional golfer and friend of Daisy Buchanan, known for her cynical and self-sufficient demeanor. She represents the new woman of the Roaring Twenties, embodying independence and a detached observation of the surrounding drama.
characters.description_ko: 조던은 프로 골프 선수이자 데이지 뷰캐넌의 친구로, 냉소적이고 자립적인 태도로 유명하다. 그녀는 1920년대의 새로운 여성을 대표하며, 독립성과 주변의 드라마를 초연하게 관찰하는 모습을 보여준다.
